item.title: Blockchain Basics
item.description: Hello Readers, In this article, I will explain what blockchain is and understand how it works. What is Blockchain? Blockchain is a distributed database that is shared among the nodes of a computer network. As a database, a blockchain stores information electronically in digital format. Blockchain technology is a distributed ledger technology (DLT) â€” It is an accounting system where the ledger (record of transactions) is distributed among a network of computers.
